sentences.en: I got it on seventeen days approval,so if you don’t like it we can change it.

sentences.en: In an unprecedented action, the army, on its own initiative, arrested seventeen civilians.
sentences.cn: 军队竟然擅自逮捕了17 个平民，这种行为简直是前所未有。

sentences.en: Debbie is the black sheep of the family, having left home at seventeen to live with her boyfriend.
